name: Skill change request
about: Propose a change to review behavior, output format, or supported modes
title: "[Skill] "

---

## Problem

What behavior is currently missing, incorrect, or too ambiguous?

## Desired Behavior

Describe the expected review behavior.

## Example Prompt / Manuscript Context

Provide a concrete example that should work better after the change.

## Risks / Tradeoffs

Any risk of overfitting instructions, adding verbosity, or weakening guardrails?
